Docs.param: The request for where to look for the header.
Docs.summary: Gets the first HTTP header value as a single value or null if not present.
Docs.returns: The first HTTP header value or null if not present.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsIfNoneMatch (this System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage request, System.Net.Http.Headers.EntityTagHeaderValue current);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsIfNoneMatch(class System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage request, class System.Net.Http.Headers.EntityTagHeaderValue current) cil managed

Docs.param: The current etag for the resource. If there is no current etag (i.e. the resource does not yet exist) then use null.
Docs.summary: Checks if the request is conditional having a If-None-Match HTTP header field with a value that matches the value. In the case of true this can be used to indicate that a 304 (Not Modified) or a 412 (Precondition Failed) status code should be used.
Docs.returns: Returns true if one of the If-None-Match values match the current etag; or the If-None-Match value is "*" and is not null; otherwise false.
